description: CustomResourceSubresources defines the status and scale subresources for CustomResources.

scale.description: scale indicates the custom resource should serve a `/scale` subresource that returns an `autoscaling/v1` Scale object.

status.description: status indicates the custom resource should serve a `/status` subresource. When enabled: 1. requests to the custom resource primary endpoint ignore changes to the `status` stanza of the object. 2. requests to the custom resource `/status` subresource ignore changes to anything other than the `status` stanza of the object.
